headline: Thermo Fisher to shut Asheville plant
summary: A global life sciences manufacturer with a presence in High Point plans to close its plant north of Asheville over the next two years, laying off more than 400 workers. In a Jan. 8 letter to the N.C. Department of Commerce and Asheville Mayor Esther Manheimer, Thermo Fisher Scientific said it expects 421 employees will lose their jobs as the company winds down its plant in Weaverville.
